Articles.Content:
Hi, My name is GOOMH it stands for:

Get

Out

Of

My

House

I got it from from the similar saying when you are dominating over someone. Ex. Beating someone at Madden . . . 52 - 3

Anyway I'm in Aerospace and rocketry and cars and of course . . . videogames.

I found KSP after someone suggested a youtuber to do a LP of it and I've been playing it for all of 1 day and have been loving it.

P.S. if any gets the title reference you win a cookie

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky
